Texts.Chs:
这些食草的和平主义者长得像鹿一样，是所有已知种族中跑得最快的。他们充满活力，虽然有些脆弱。

^orange;食性^reset;：杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;：
+^green;15^reset;%移动速度
^green;抗性^reset;: ^green;30^reset;%寒气抗性, ^green;20^reset;%电系抗性
优秀商人：+^green;15^reset;% 魅力

^orange;环境^reset;：
^green;葱郁/森林/原始森林/草原/冻土/冰雪生态^reset;: +^green;10^reset;%物理抗性, 防御x^green;1.15^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;：
巨斧：伤害x^green;1.2^reset;
斧/矛：+^green;25^reset;%击退抗性，生命x^green;1.05^reset;
矛：3%几率施加冰系伤害
环刃/回旋镖：+^green;1.5^reset;%暴击几率，+^green;5^reset;暴击伤害
弓：伤害x^green;1.15^reset;，防御Defense x^green;1.18^reset;

^red;弱点^reset;：
^red;抗性^reset;：-^red;20^reset;%毒素&火炎&物理抗性
Texts.Eng:
Deer-like, these herbivorous pacifists are among the fastest of the known races. They are full of vitality, if a little fragile.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;15^reset;% speed
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Ice, +^green;20^reset;% Electric
  Great Traders: +^green;15^reset;% Charisma

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Lush, Forest, Primeval, Rainforest, Savannah, Tundra, and Snow^reset; biomes: +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resistance, and Defense x^green;1.15^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Greataxe: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;
  Axe / Spear: +^green;25^reset;% Knockback Resist, Health x^green;1.05^reset;
  Spear: 3% chance of Ice element attack
  Chakram / Boomerang: +^green;1.5^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;5^reset; Crit Damage
  Bow: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, Defense x^green;1.18^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Poison, Fire, Physical
